title: Order Block Visualization
prompt: Create a professional trading chart showing Order Block concept. Display 10-15 candlesticks with clear price movement. Highlight a bearish Order Block (supply zone): Last bullish candle before a strong bearish impulse move, marked with a blue/purple rectangle zone extending to the right. Show price returning to test the Order Block zone with rejection. Label key elements: 'Order Block Zone', 'Impulse Move', 'Mitigation/Test', 'Rejection'. Add 'OB' badge on the zone. Include price axis on right, subtle grid lines. Dark background (#0F172A). Use green candles for bullish (#10B981), red for bearish (#EF4444). Zone highlighted in semi-transparent blue (#3B82F6 at 30% opacity). Clean TradingView-style chart aesthetic.
negative_prompt: cluttered indicators, too many candles, overlapping labels, amateur chart style, pixelated
